text: frh almukhalafun aladhin tkhlfu ean rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasalam bqewdhm fi (almdyn) mukhalifin larasul allah salaa allah ealayh wslm, wakarihuu 'an yujahiduu maeah bi'amwalihim wa'anfusihim fi sabil allh, waqal bedhm lbed: la tanfiruu fi alhrri, wakanat ghzw (tbwk) fi waqt shdt alhrri. qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: nar jahanam 'ashadu hrana, law kanuu yaelamun dhlk
